scripts.build-gateway: docker build -f devops/gateway.Dockerfile -t gateway . && docker tag gateway mgasfsu667/gateway && docker push mgasfsu667/gateway
scripts.build-websocket: docker build -f devops/websocket.Dockerfile -t websocket-demo . && docker tag websocket-demo mgasfsu667/websocket-demo && docker push mgasfsu667/websocket-demo
scripts.build-messanger: docker build -f devops/messanger.Dockerfile -t messanger-demo . && docker tag messanger-demo mgasfsu667/messanger-demo && docker push mgasfsu667/messanger-demo
scripts.build-frontend: docker build -f devops/frontend.Dockerfile -t react-demo . && docker tag react-demo mgasfsu667/react-demo && docker push mgasfsu667/react-demo
scripts.build-imageservice: docker build -f devops/imageService.Dockerfile -t imageservice-demo . && docker tag imageservice-demo mgasfsu667/imageservice-demo && docker push mgasfsu667/imageservice-demo
scripts.build-authservice: docker build -f devops/authService.Dockerfile -t authservice-demo . && docker tag authservice-demo mgasfsu667/authservice-demo && docker push mgasfsu667/authservice-demo
scripts.build-jobworker: docker build -f devops/jobworker.Dockerfile -t jobworker-demo . && docker tag jobworker-demo mgasfsu667/jobworker-demo && docker push mgasfsu667/jobworker-demo
scripts.build-listingservice: docker build -f devops/listingService.Dockerfile -t listingservice-demo . && docker tag listingservice-demo mgasfsu667/listingservice-demo && docker push mgasfsu667/listingservice-demo
scripts.deploy: docker-compose -f devops/docker-compose.yml pull && docker stack deploy -c devops/docker-compose.yml message-app
scripts.deploy-services: docker-compose -f devops/docker-redis.yml pull && docker swarm init && docker stack deploy -c devops/docker-redis.yml message-app
